title: New client sucks
body: this new client is so trash like literally it freezes so much and constantly lags and the old client looks 100x better i keep trying to use the new client cause eventually im sure the legacy client wont be available but i keep accidentally dodging queues cause the whole client freezes and i cant pick a champ which never happened on the old client might i add

replies.body:
I'm just curious, did you try the *Low Spec Mode* or *Disable Animations* features in the new client? We've seen some performance issues on lower-end hardware, so these features have been helping some players see better performance with the Beta. You can access these features after hitting the cog icon at the top-right of the client. Below is a screenshot showing what I mean:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if you have any questions.

My client doesn't have such an option as Disable Animations. It has an option of Enable Newbie Help Tips.
New client still sucks. It keeps on crashing. Having lag spike issues. And all the reasons why I don't play rank anymore. It's hard to play well when the service is not helping!!!

If you're experiencing this many issues with the Beta Client, it's advised to utilize the Legacy Client. By the time the Legacy Client is retired, the Beta Client would be optimized so you wouldn't experience the issue you described.
